doc:
Kipps http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kipps 0 Kipps: The Story of a Simple Soul is a novel by H. G. Wells, first published in 1905. Humorous yet sympathetic, the perceptive social novel is generally regarded as a masterpiece, and it was his own favourite work.It was adapted into the stage and cinema musical Half a Sixpence. Kipps: The Story of a Simple Soul is a novel by H. G. Wells, first published in 1905. Humorous yet sympathetic, the perceptive social novel is generally regarded as a masterpiece, and it was his own favourite work.It was adapted into the stage and cinema musical Half a Sixpence.
